name: Potion of Resistance
desc:
After you drink this potion, for the next hour you gain resistance to a single type of damage (chosen by the Narrator or determined randomly).

__**Table: Potion of Resistance**__
| **d10** | **Damage Type** |
| ------- | --------------- |
| 1       | Thunder         |
| 2       | Lightning       |
| 3       | Cold            |
| 4       | Poison          |
| 5       | Fire            |
| 6       | Psychic         |
| 7       | Acid            |
| 8       | Necrotic        |
| 9       | Radiant         |
| 10      | Force           |
